title: Ping rose randomly
body: I have been with 40-43 ping since the server change never once has it gone up or down but played a game today and it's at 100?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  A sudden ping spike can be caused by network issues like packet loss.  It could be due to your ISP's routing, but there are some steps to take to find out for sure.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these matches to get an overview of what's going wrong.  You will also get a set of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Hope that helps!
Yeah I have the same problem.  It went from 40-43 to 89 for me just today.  I live in Colorado.

> [{quoted}](name=Minjammben,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kiQ5WV49,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-02T06:13:10.228+0000)
>
> Yeah I have the same problem.  It went from 40-43 to 89 for me just today.  I live in Colorado.

i live in colorado aswell with comcast do you have comcast aswell?

> [{quoted}](name=Minjammben,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kiQ5WV49,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-02T06:19:12.551+0000)
>
> Yes I have Comcast.

starting to see a pattern <.>

I tried to run a tracert to one of riot's game servers' ip addresses.  The one everybody used to check their ping  when the server move happened (104.160.131.2), and this is the last few results for mine:

>   5    17 ms    18 ms    18 ms  ae-50-ar01.denver.co.denver.comcast.net [68.86.104.73]
>   6    18 ms    20 ms    20 ms  be-33652-cr01.1601milehigh.co.ibone.comcast.net [68.86.92.121]
>   7    23 ms    19 ms    18 ms  be-11719-cr02.denver.co.ibone.comcast.net [68.86.86.77]
>   8    14 ms    18 ms    16 ms  hu-0-11-0-4-pe02.910fifteenth.co.ibone.comcast.net [68.86.84.166]
>   9    15 ms    15 ms    18 ms  75.149.228.210
>  10    16 ms    16 ms    16 ms  104.160.138.35
>  11    42 ms    43 ms    43 ms  ae32-br02.pdx02.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.30]
>  12    39 ms    44 ms    41 ms  ae1-br01.pdx02.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.0]
>  13    49 ms    45 ms    48 ms  xe-0-1-4-br01.sea01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.3]
>  14    87 ms    88 ms    88 ms  ae30-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.10]
>  15    85 ms    86 ms    89 ms  ae1-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.9]
>  16    89 ms    83 ms    86 ms  104.160.131.2

Somewhere in the middle of that it jumps from mid 40s ping to high 80s ping which is a bit irregular.

Same problem here colorado, comcast went from 40-43-100
so annoying.
